price: (18) He [i.e., man] utters no word except that with him is an observer prepared [to record].
arabic: مَّا يَلۡفِظُ مِن قَوۡلٍ إِلَّا لَدَيۡهِ رَقِيبٌ عَتِيدٞ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: mā yalfiẓu min qawlin illā ladayhi raqībun ʿatīdun
